traits.locale_text: Ты давай аккуратнее, если повредим хозяйское добро — нас обоих на растопку Фесмофориуса пустят.

languages.text: "Ага, конечно... аккуратнее "пакуй", а то если ты сейчас что-то раздавишь или сломаешь — оба на растопку Фесмофориуса пойдем".
"Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."
languages.original_text: "Ага, конечно... аккуратнее "пакуй", а то если ты сейчас что-то раздавишь или сломаешь — оба на растопку Фесмофориуса пойдем".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."
"Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

"Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."
"Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

languages.text: "Hmm, stimmt ... Aber Vorsicht beim 'Packen'. Wenn jetzt etwas zerstört wird, füttern wir beide den Phesmophorius."
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm, stimmt ... Aber Vorsicht beim 'Packen'. Wenn jetzt etwas zerstört wird, füttern wir beide den Phesmophorius."

languages.text: « Si tu le dis... Prudence tout de même avec ton "emballage". Si tu casses quelque chose, on nous jettera en pâture au Phesmophorius. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: « Si tu le dis... Prudence tout de même avec ton "emballage". Si tu casses quelque chose, on nous jettera en pâture au Phesmophorius. »

languages.text: “好吧，行……装的时候当心点。要是压坏了什么东西，或者打碎了什么东西，咱们两个就全得喂菲斯摩弗瑞斯了。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，行……装的时候当心点。要是压坏了什么东西，或者打碎了什么东西，咱们两个就全得喂菲斯摩弗瑞斯了。”

languages.text: «Mmm, ya... Pues cuidado con tu "empaquetado". Como aplastes o rompas algo, nos van a echar al Fesmoforio».
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm, ya... Pues cuidado con tu "empaquetado". Como aplastes o rompas algo, nos van a echar al Fesmoforio».

languages.text: 「ふむ、そうか…『梱包』には気をつけろよ。もし今何かを潰したり壊したりしたら、私たち二人ともフェスモフォリウスの餌食になるからね」
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ、そうか…『梱包』には気をつけろよ。もし今何かを潰したり壊したりしたら、私たち二人ともフェスモフォリウスの餌食になるからね」

languages.text: "Ya... Haklısın. Şu paketleme işinde dikkatli ol yalnız. Bir şeyleri kıracak ya da ezecek olursan ikimiz de Pesmoforyus'a yem oluruz."
languages.original_text: "Hmm, right... Be careful with your 'packing.' If you crush or break something now, we'll both be going to feed the Phesmophorius."

traits.locale_text: "Hım... Haklısın. Şu paketleme işinde dikkatli ol yalnız. Bir şeyleri kıracak ya da ezecek olursan ikimiz de Pesmoforyus'a yem oluruz."
